textBeforeTable: Ride Requirements: Happy Hollow has new rides that will be sure to delight all ages. Please be aware of the height requirements and other restrictions for each ride. In some case an adult will be required to ride with a child that doesn’t meet the minimum height requirements.   Smoking: Happy Hollow Park and Zoo is a smoke free facility. Please see San Jose City Ordinance 13.44.130 for more details.   Recreation & Sound Equipment: Recreation and sound equipment is not permitted within Happy Hollow and may not be stored with park staff. Bike racks are conveniently located outside the turnstiles in the Entry plaza.   Lockers: Single use lockers are available for a small fee and are conveniently located adjacent to the restrooms at the front of the park and near the Puppet Castle Theater. (Lockers operate by tokens, which can be purchased at the Admissions windows)   Wheelchair/Stroller Rental: Wheelchair and stroller rental is located inside and to the left of the entrance turnstiles at the far end of the Explore and More store. Wheel Chairs and strollers are available of a first come / first serve basis and quantities are limited.   Lost and Found Visit Guest & Member Services inside and just right of the entrance turnstiles to report lost and found items. Happy Hollow Park & Zoo is not responsible for lost, missing or stolen personal property. Send
textAfterTable: See ride for additional requirements and restrictions. Ratings 1. Low Thrill Ride - Rides that are generally calm and gentle in nature. 2. Mild Thrill Ride - Rides that generally have low speeds with gentle motion and braking. Rides have smooth transitions with some changes in elevation and speed. Notes 1 All unescorted riders must have adequate head and neck control and be able to sit unsupported in an upright position 2 Adult Escort must be at least 16 years old and meet required ride restrictions. 3 Guests are not permitted to save places in line or exit the line and return for any reason. 4 All guests are required to wear shoes, shirts and shorts/pants while enjoying the rides and attractions.
